PerfectNetExp.abs: 7.陀思妥耶夫思基特色（Dostoevskian）　　出处：《西斯的复仇》 　　点评：好莱坞名导乔治.卢卡斯耗费多时，献上《星战前传3：西斯 …

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or in the style of Feodor Dostoevski

auth_sentence.content: In the same note, he says how much he admired Philip Roth, who was enjoying, as he saw it, a Dostoevskian golden period.
auth_sentence.res_content: In the same note, he says how much he admired Philip Roth, who was enjoying, as he saw it, a Dostoevskian golden period.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In the same note, he says how much he admired Philip Roth, who was enjoying, as he saw it, a Dostoevskian golden period.

auth_sentence.content: There was a sort of Dostoevskian gloss to him, the redeemed criminal, and Dostoevsky was on Wallace's mind.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: There was a sort of Dostoevskian gloss to him, the redeemed criminal, and Dostoevsky was on Wallace's mind.
